# M09 Modules

## Topics

- How Python organizes code into modules, packages, and libraries
- How to write your own modules
- How to package and share your modules 

## Readings

### Suggested

* [Lutz 2017, Part V. Modules and Packages &rarr; Up to Ch. 24.](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/learning-python-5th/9781449355722/part05.html)
* [Python Package Tutorial](https://python-packaging.readthedocs.io/en/latest/minimal.html)

### Optional 

* [Namespaces and Scope in Python (Real Python)](https://realpython.com/python-namespaces-scope/) for a good primer.
* [Packaging Projects (Python Docs)](https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/tutorials/packaging-projects/)
* [Python Packaging User Guide (Python Packaging Authority)](https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/overview/)
